Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward  2
Water & Sewer Comm. No. 4 -- Prop. #1 - $1,200,000 Bond - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(BONDS)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO ISSUE $1,200,000 OF 20 YEAR GENERAL OBLIGATION BONDS FOR CONSTRUCTING AND ACQUIRING IMPROVEMENTS TO THE EXISTING WATERWORKS PLANT AND SYSTEM OF THE COMMISSION, TITLE TO WHICH SHALL BE IN THE PUBLIC.
Race.FullText: Shall St. Mary Water and Sewer Commission No. 4, State of Louisiana (the "Commission"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of One Million Two Hundred Thousand Dollars ($1,200,000) to run twenty (20) years from the date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding seven (7%) per annum, for the purpose of constructing and acquiring improvements to the existing waterworks plant and system of the Commission, title to which shall be in the public, which bonds will be general obligations of said Commission and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: Water & Sewer Comm. No. 4 -- Prop. #2 - 15.31 Mill - BOC - 10. Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(MAINTENANCE TAX)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 15.31 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR OPERATING, MAINTAINING, IMPROVING AND EXTENDING THE WATERWORKS PLANT AND SYSTEM AND SEWER AND SEWERAGE TREATMENT OR DISPOSAL FACILITIES OWNED AND/OR OPERATED BY THE COMMISSION.
Race.FullText: Shall St. Mary Parish Water and Sewer Commission No. 4, State of Louisiana (the "Commission"), levy a fifteen and thirty-one hundredths (15.31) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $385,000) on all the property subject to taxation in the Commission for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of operating, maintaining, improving and extending the waterworks plant and system and sewer and sewerage treatment or disposal facilities owned and/or operated by the Commission, 8.31 mills of which tax shall represent a replacement of a similar tax heretofore levied by Waterworks District No. 6 of the Parish through the year 2006 and 7 mills of which tax shall replace and be in lieu of a similar tax authorized to be levied by Sewerage District No. 9 of the Parish through the year 2013?
